DOC.brief_summary: The aim study identify effect Polygoni Multiflori Radix complex extract memory improvement use Rey-Kim scale healthy people .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trials Effects Polygoni Multiflori Radix Complex Extract Memory Improvement
DOC.criteria: A person 50 year lesser 70 year age A person 's MQ ( Memory Quotient ) score within 70 less 120 The patient past history relate memory The patient Diabetes Mellitus The person whose fast blood sugar 126mg/dL The patient uncontrolled hypertension The patient liver disorder The patient whose AST ( aspartate aminotransferase ) ALT ( alanine aminotransferase ) level 60 IU/L ( international unit per liter ) The patient heart disorder ( Angina pectoris , Myocardial infarction ) The patient past history relate excision GI tract exclude cecum The patient take drug heal functional food within 4 week screen The patient take decoction herb within 4 week screen The patient ca n't write communicate pregnant woman
